Articles.Content: I've always wanted to make a mod. The only problem: No experience. I've looked at the wiki tutorials but the 3-d modeler I have is Sketchup. I was wondering if anyone could give me a tutorial on modding with sketchUp.

Unless you're already very competent with Sketckup, you would be better served to download Blender (its free!) and start learning with it - Blender's 3d models are natively the kind that Unity/KSP needs, whereas Sketchups are converted during export and if you don't do things a certain way when modeling, they will not export in a usable way and you'll end up redoing them in another program anyway.
